biotools.summary:
A python toolbox for assessing microbial growth and cell viability in high-throughput colony screens.

A python toolbox for phenotype analysis of arrayed microbial colonies written by Stephan Kamrad (stephan.kamrad at crick.ac.uk).

bioschemas.name: pyphe

A python toolbox for phenotype analysis of arrayed microbial colonies written by Stephan Kamrad (stephan.kamrad at crick.ac.uk).
